resources.string: This is the main launch screen and provides navigation to the other parts of the program.
APIs/Libraries: To enable the purchasing the following payments APIs will be considered: Stripe (https://stripe.com/), Square (https://squareup.com)
This Activity will allow the user to purchase the currently playing song.
An image of the artist would be shown. This image would be loaded off the UI thread by using a library like Picasso or Glide.
This Activity will show details about the song that is currently playing.
This Activity will show the Top 100 Rap Songs. The user can click a song and it will start playing.
This screen would be done with a ListView and adapter instead of buttons for each song.
This Activity will show the Top 100 Rock Songs. The user can click a song and it will start playing.
